alert.note: Alert for Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 11:23AM CDT until June 15 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CDT FOR MARENGO COUNTY... At 1123 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Magnolia, or 11 miles southeast of Linden, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Linden, Thomaston, Sweet Water, Myrtlewood, Dayton, Freddie Jones Field, Nanafalia, Consul, Magnolia, Wayne, Surginer, Miller, Chickasaw State Park, Dixons Mill, Vineland, Half Acre, Octagon, Clayhill and Calvary. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
